definition: to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

sentences.english: Judging by recent form, he should easily pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 全隊經過六個月的訓練競技狀態極佳。

sentences.english: To value the employment courses and practical training.
sentences.chinese: 重視就業學程與實作訓練。

sentences.english: For starters, it's being held in the gymnasium at Valley High School, a few miles from the Strip.
sentences.chinese: 訓練在山谷高中已經有一陣子，距離繁華區有幾英里。

sentences.english: Yeah, well, I'm actually in basic training at the minute.
sentences.chinese: 其實我現在就在接受基本的訓練。

sentences.english: " Gentling " means training it to except accept the human attention need it needed for care and gloomygrooming.
sentences.chinese: “馴化”意味着訓練他們接受人類必要的照顧與護理。

sentences.english: The keepers, Fiori and Kalac , trained apart.
sentences.chinese: 門將費奧裏和卡拉奇，在一旁訓練。

sentences.english: Generally speaking , the most pianists all accepted the professional training in the year one.
sentences.chinese: 大凡鋼琴家都在早年接受過專業訓練。

sentences.english: The Commission or training institution may give reward to those who are outstanding in performance.
sentences.chinese: 成績特優者，由本會或訓練機構給予獎勵。

sentences.english: At Kajaki the Royal Marines are training local army recruits .
sentences.chinese: 英國皇家海軍陸戰隊正在卡加克訓練當地的新兵。

sentences.english: Many charity races like Race for the Cure also have team training programs.
sentences.chinese: 許多慈善團體如賽跑會也會有團隊訓練計劃。

sentences.english: The flexible Red Knife allows officers to rehearse responses to edged weapon attacks.
sentences.chinese: 柔性紅刀可訓練警官模仿在銳器襲擊時反應。

sentences.english: There are the Primavera youngsters who arrive here and acquire the mentality of a fantastic team.
sentences.chinese: 也會有青訓球員一起訓練，學習球隊的精神。

sentences.english: Only the Indian elephant can be trained by man.
sentences.chinese: 只有印度象能接受人的訓練。

sentences.english: Finally, a new separation hyperplane is generated by the optimization training.
sentences.chinese: 最後，通過優化訓練，產生一個新的分離超平面。

sentences.english: The Delingha brigade is often referred to as a training unit.
sentences.chinese: 德令哈旅經常被認爲是一支訓練部隊。

definition: to toughen/to temper/to engage in physical exercise/to work out/(fig.) to develop one's skills/to train oneself
to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk
to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
to cultivate/to breed/to foster/to nurture/to educate/to groom (for a position)/education/fostering/culture (biology)
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
